However, for the resort fee guests are assessed, it would have been so nice to include a free wash and dry for guests (only one per unit and it would have been so nice!)  Marriott timeshares have free services like this for everyone.    Owners do not pay the steep

Summary Heading: Recently remodeled rooms with Ocean View

The units on the North end have a balcony view of the Mexican restuarant's parking lot and trash dumpster.  They do have a western view from the balcony for sunsets, but also the prevailing northerly winds.  The South end of the building units have a much better ocean view and are shielded from the prevailing winds.  Management and staff was very nice and accomodating.
Room tip: Two bedroom units on the South end of the building are best (116,216, & 316)

Another seal was on the dish washer as well with all dishes cleaned. As a over abundance of caution, we Clorox wiped all surfaces and uses Lysol spray on all fabric services. To our surprise they was ZERO dirt on any hard surfaces.  There was hand sanitizer at all elevators and the lobby. Knowing

Although it can be very smelly if your neighbors does BBQ...  This hotel has small but convenient pool with Jacuzzi. Jacuzzi was crowded during our visit but you have your own bath jet in your room. This hotel has strange cleaning policy - you need ask for cleaning for additional fee, your garbage you need to put out front door in the morning.
Manager Response: Vitaliy94080, we're so glad to hear you had a great time on your stay with us. Hopefully you got to enjoy some great beach time while you were here! Thanks for taking the time to leave us a review, and we hope to see you back with us soon.

Summary: The rooms are very spacious and they have all the tools to cook and make you feel at home. The pool is great with beach views. There is easy beach access but the beach was very rocky. The girls at the reception desk were super helpful and nice. Parking is only available for one vehicle and hard to find in public areas if you didn’t have an extra parking pass. Would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Hi Yvette - thank you for being our guest at Capistrano Surfside Inn. We are so glad that you enjoyed your accommodations, as well as the amazing beach views that can be seen from the pool area. Our team takes pride in providing a resort that feels like home during your vacation and we are thrilled to hear we hit that mark. Thank you again and we look forward to welcoming you back!

Summary: The resort is very clean, and quiet, excellent location across the street from the beach. Doesn't get much better. Resort is close to shopping and restaurants, also close to numerous piers water activities and excellent beaches close to Laguna beach, San Clementi, and Dana Point.
Manager Response: none

Summary: stayed at the resort when Holy fires were in Riverside County. The week was warm and the ocean was warm and beautiful.  the resort is directly across from beach and easily reached with stairways.  The resort is small(under 40 suites) but everything necessary is included.
Manager Response: We are so happy that we could be of service to you and your family during the fires.  We are delighted to hear that our team provided you with a positive experience that allowed you to relax and enjoy the beauty of the world.  We hope that you don't hesitate to come back to see us.

Summary: Great place, convenient location, friendly staff. Room was clean and well designed. Full kitchen is great for cooking your own meals. Balcony has a grill. Comfortable bed. The beach is right across the road. Would stay here again.
Manager Response: Hello Marina - we strive for 100% satisfaction, and it is great to see you had such a positive experience at Capistrano Surfside Inn. We hope that you enjoyed spending some time at the beach and cooking some great meals in the kitchen. We can't wait to see you again, have a great day.

Summary: The location is great but the rooms are very dated. Most of the rooms have no view except for a ugly cliff. Staff was nice. I have stayed here before and would stay again because of the location and the convenience of the trolley
Manager Response: Hello Genie - thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent experience. We are disappointed to hear that you are not 100% satisfied with your visit, however happy to know that you will come back to see us again. Thank you again for your feedback. We hope you have a great day.

Summary Heading: Stayed a week in late July and had a great time
Summary: This is a small resort but across the street and railroad tracks.from Capistrano Beach, in Orange County.  The only trains are short commuter trains between LA and  San Diego.There is a pedestrian overpass out front of the resort to the beach.  Being a small resort, everything was close by, unlike a resort in Palm springs where we had to take bus between amenities. When you are across the street from the beach, you don't need many amenities. It has  a great hot tub and pool, again with a view of the beach. Lots of great restaurants near by, including 3 next door to the resort.  If you like the beach, you will love this resort.
Manager Response: We couldn't have said it better ourselves - we proud to provide our guest with great accommodations, amenities, and amazing service. We love   hearing we hit the mark with you and your family. Thank you for the kind review and we hope to see you back again.

Summary Heading: The worst refund policy of any hotel I've been to
Summary: I would have given them 5 stars but they didn't keep things as clean as they should have. It wasn't filthy it just needed some attention in a few areas. As much as they charge for this place they certainly have the funds to hire some part-time help. That's when I was going to give them 4 stars then I factored in their return policy. We got our room directly through the hotel not a discount website. One of us had to leave for an urgent matter at home. We didn't want to cancel the current night we wanted to cancel the next overnight. They explaind the return policy and we didn't argue. We just knew we would put their rating on TripAdvisor and they can learn from this and hopefully treat their customers better. One of us ended up driving home alone in a rental vehicle while the
Manager Response: We are sorry to hear you were unhappy with our return policy. Please do not hesitate to call if there is anything we can do to turn this around for you, or if you have questions we can answer. Thank you.

Summary: *3 Capistrano Surfside Inn Part of Diamond chain Capistrano Beach Great location, cross the Pacific Coast Hwy and train track from the beach Accommodations are good The staff is super  The problem is checking. There were several people that had 4+ hour delays in checking in.
Manager Response: Hi Rosquete - we are sorry that you ran into a delay at check-in. Our standard check-in time is late afternoon and we try to get everyone signed in as quickly as possible so they can get to their room and settle in. Please don't hesitate to call us if you would like to speak with us directly. We can also answer any questions you might have. Thanks.

Summary: First time we had to put up with a dog (not a service animal) just someone's dirty dog in the resort.  The common hallways  (carpet, walls) very dirty. Very noisy unit - lots of upstairs noise, very loud air conditioners - difficult to watch tv while air conditioner on.  Garbage and trash stacked up near elevator in parking garage making it smell disgusting.  Couch in living room uncomfortable - hard as cardboard.
Manager Response: Joe - first of all, thank you for sharing your feedback. Guest reviews following stays are important to us here at Capistrano Surfside Inn.  We are, of course, dismayed to hear that you were disappointed by your experience. It is certainly not how we want our guests to feel when they head home from their beach vacation.  We would like the opportunity to address your concerns directly and encourage you to call. This will give us a better understanding so we can work on the issues you noted.  Thank you and we look forward to hearing from you.

Summary Heading: ALWAYS return to Cap Surfside Inn
Summary: We have been staying for years and we always love our time at Capistrano Surfside Inn. This is a small, quaint, and friendly place nestled between Dana Point Harbor and San Clemente CA.  Each unit is like an apartment with a private balcony and your own gas grill. The units are slowly being  remodeled, and NOT all units have an ocean view, but for us it is about being near the Pacific ocean. Visitors must walk across Pacific Coast Highway and railroad tracks to get to the beach or drive a couple of blocks down to pay and enter by car.  There is a small outside pool and jacuzzi. We have grown to love the sounds of the trains and some highway traffic throughout the day. Nearby are an abundance of amazing Restaurants, shopping, water sports, and  free trolley rides. The staff is
Manager Response: Thank you so much for making us one of your favorite vacation destinations every year. We LOVE that you love staying with us!

Summary: Very nice resort. Small but meets all your travel needs. Great location!!! Beach is across the street. The resort has chairs and umbrellas for you to use. Great restaurants next door...Olamendis (mexican) Agostinos ( Italian) both are great and a fun bar Sunsets. Great friendly staff!!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful review - we love seeing that our guests truly enjoy their stays with us.

Summary Heading: Timeshare owner, two bedroom and an one bedroom.
Summary: We have been spending a week with the family the last 18 years at this resort. We enjoy it very much. Great place, wonderful people.We book both of our rooms at the same time so that our family could be together.
Manager Response: We love our longtime owners who come back year after year with their families to make memories. It's what vacation ownership is all about.

Summary: I got into the SNA Airport behind schedule and arrived at the condo an hour from midnight. The front office helped me get settled, find a place to get something to eat and locate the nearest convenience store/grocery store. I will definitely be back!
Manager Response: We're always happy to help - thanks for staying with us, Kelly!

Summary: Everything was a expected. We had a wonderful time. It was everything we had hoped it would be. Great View, right by the beach and pool. Mexican Restaurant right next door. Kitchen was great too have. BBQ on the patio was a nice touch. Love this place and hope too return soon.
Manager Response: It's great to hear that you had such a wonderful time with us, Ruben, and that you had a chance to try Olamendi's. It's a fabulous restaurant! Thanks for the wonderful review and we hope to see you again!

Summary Heading: Beautiful view if on the otherside of the building, pool big enough for one family only, no soundproofing here...
Summary: Our room was mostly clean and o.k. in appearance with nice beach art on the wall. The ad we saw when we booked the room showed ocean view rooms however we had a view of a steep hillside. The rating was 4 stars and really good reviews on the page I originally saw but when I got the receipt and looked again it was 3 stars. We were comfortable in the bed and could have slept well if the ceiling fan was not so noisy and the neighbor had not woke us up. The next morning there were people in the hallway talking really loud...walls are paper thin so not a good setting for a romantic weekend.
Manager Response: Hi Linda - we're sorry to hear you were a bit disappointed. Please do not hesitate to reach out if you would like to speak to us about your stay - we would be more than happy to address any concerns.

Summary Heading: Capistrano Surfside Inn is disappointing without a room with a view
Summary: This resort is average at best if you cannot get a room with a view of the ocean.  I stayed here years ago and enjoyed it largely because of the view.  Coming from Colorado and spending 9 days, I was primarily looking forward to the view and relaxing in the mornings there.  I got a room in the back that has a dreary view of a steep hillside leaving no sense that I was near the ocean.  When I arrived, I was told that I needed to request a view, but was never told during or after booking the room, which I booked many months in advance.  Then I was told that I could not request a view if I did not own at the resort. The back rooms are dark and dreary.  I was charged $15 per day for 'amenities' which I never used except the internet, which was useless for half of our stay.  I was
Manager Response: Hi Randy R thank you for taking the time to leave us your honest feedback. We apologize for the less than satisfactory view and hope we can accommodate your requests in the future. We'll wok toward improving our communication of work requests and resort fees. We do hope you enjoyed your vacation and were able to enjoy the beach.

Summary: Great location, love the renovated rooms, friendly staff, best night of sleep I had in ages.  Love being close to the beach and surf.  Check in was quick and easy, as was checkout.  Staff helped to recommend local places to eat and visit.
Manager Response: Sounds like you had a wonderful time - and got some great sleep. Thanks for staying with us, Christopher!

Summary: Our family had a wonderful time staying at the Surfside Inn! The staff was very helpful and friendly and recommended some great places to go explore. The room was clean and roomy with a huge tub & full kitchen. We especially enjoyed the complimentary bikes and beach items (boogie boards, etc) available for us and our kids. Besides being across the street from a nice viewing/strolling beach, the location is also very close to Dana Point, and many other family-friendly beaches are only minutes away. Our family just returned from a vacation here and were pleasantly surprised at how much we enjoyed staying here. We definitely recommend it!
Manager Response: Thanks for the recommendation, Annie!

Summary: Capistrano Surfside is a delightful place to stay.  It is low key and very relaxing.  It is right across from the beach and has the bridge right there. The rooms are large and comfortable, and the staff is so helpful and kind.
Manager Response: Thanks for the wonderful review, Ruth!

Summary: We spent a 7-night stay here in an ocean-view one-bedroom unit.  The complex is very clean, check-in went well (Amanda was super!), our room was nicely appointed, and the kitchen had full-size appliances, including a dishwasher.  Our king-size bed was very comfortable and the trains that run directly across the highway do not sound their horn (no crossing here so no need for the horn, we assume).  It did not disturb our sleep.  The units are undergoing updating and ours probably was one of those recently done units (221).  The small patio had a gas grill, as well as a table and 4 chairs.  There is a cross-walk in front of the property but the elevated cross-over to the beach is not yet complete so access to the beach is via the next cross-walk up the road.    The property has a
Manager Response: Thanks for the taking the time to write such a thoughtful review - we appreciate it!

Summary: There are so many activities and sightseeing close by and the ocean views are wonderful.  Two excellent restaurants are next to the property and Dana point Harbor is nearby.  We went on a whale watching trip there. There is a beach access ( bridge over "Coastliner" train tracks } and complimentary beach equipment is available as well as Bicycles for cruising on beach bike trails.
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review, Bob - we're glad you had a fun time!

Summary: Surfside’s location right across from the ocean is ideal.  The cruiser bicycles provide a tool for a short jaunt to ride right on the beach!  The staff is very helpful in suggesting nearby attractions.  The staff really CARES.
Manager Response: Thanks for the wonderful review!

Summary Heading: LOCATION WAS GOOD but no working shower.
Summary: It is a nice place.  Good location.  Shower did not work.  Seemed to be a timeshare. I think it would be a good place to hang for a couple of days by the beach in the summer.  It had a kitchen and a small living room.
Manager Response: Thanks for rating us, Nancy - we're sorry to hear you had problems with the shower and hope we were able to resolve for you.

Summary: I thought this was a hotel booking not a timeshare. Thoroughly disappointed to have to make sure my room was clean upon leaving or pay a fee on top of the fees they already charge. No clean towels given bare minimum toilet paper rooms very dated sofa extremely uncomfortable. I’m on vacation trying to relax not playhouse maid.
Manager Response: Hi Carole, we regret to hear that you are displeased with your stay with us. We would like the opportunity to address your concerns - please do not hesitate to reach out to us directly. We would be happy to take your call. Thanks.

Summary Heading: Don't get a room facing east!
Summary: Dirty un-maintained room facing a hill in short range.  Vents were filthy, top of fan not dusted, furniture dated (compared to ocean side rooms), side of refrigerator delaminating, staff taking very long breaks talking to each other and on the phone in "owners lounge" to the point I couldn't work on my PC, ceiling issues, and dirty floors.  Cat urine smell also.  I did ask to be moved but they said there were no rooms available, even though there were.  Pics attached. I'm embarrassed for them.  Their ocean view rooms are lovely.  But they should close down the rooms facing the hill until they can remodel.  I got sick in that hillside room and it could be a coincidence or maybe the dishes weren't quite washed.  I'll never know on that one.  I actually do recommend the rooms
Manager Response: We appreciate your honest feedback. We set a high standard for ourselves, so we are disappointed to hear that your experience with us was not a positive one. We would like the opportunity to address your concerns. Please reach out to us directly at (949) 240-7681 when you have a chance. Thank you, and we look forward to hearing from you.

Summary: We just got back from a wonderful week at Capistrano Surfside Inn.  We exchanged a week through Trading Places.  I had requested an ocean view a month prior to arriving and felt very fortunate to get one!  At first the room seemed a bit dated, but after a few days, I really came to love the furnishings and cleanliness and spaciousness of the Condo.   We had a one bedroom and our little girl slept on the pull out in the living room. Our bed was extremely comfortable.  The kitchen was stocked with everything we needed.  We used the wonderful grill right on the deck and enjoyed eating out there overlooking the ocean.  We swam in the pool and hot tub every night.  It wasn't crowded, so we always had the entire pool to ourselves.  The pool water was very warm and so much fun!  The
Manager Response: We're happy you had a wonderful week with us! Thanks so much for the awesome review.

Summary Heading: across the street from the beach
Summary: this was what I would expect from a beach side cottage type hotel stay, the rooms have a little smell to them as they are damp from being so close to the ocean, it is not a luxury resort by any means.I did not visit the beach across the street, I traded timeshare to come here and spent most of my time in San Diego and other beaches in the area
Manager Response: Thanks for your feedback - we're happy you had a chance to stay with us and explore SoCal. Appreciate the review!

Summary: We spent a week here and enjoyed every minute. ALL staff were very friendly and helpful. We had a one bedroomed apartment with a full kitchen and it was facing the ocean. All balconies had a BBQ. I was very apprehensive about the road and a railway in front of the hotel, but when the windows were closed you could not hear anything. And we were not disturbed either when sitting on the balcony relaxing or having a meal.  The pool was nice and we used it a few times at the end of the day to relax after a day trip out.  The marina at  Dana Point is a few minutes drive away where there are restaurants, a park with BBQ's and there is also small beach for children. There are also boat trips to go whale watching, which we did.  Capistrano Surfside Inn is easily situated to drive down
Manager Response: We're glad you enjoyed your stay with us here at Capistrano Surfside Inn. Thank you so much for taking the time to share your insights about your trip. Much appreciated!

Summary: We have visited many times, and most of the time I am very satisfied with everything.  Our room did not have the updated kitchen, but the original kitchen served our needs.  It is fully equipped.   My granddaughter did all the cooking, and the rest of us just enjoyed it immensely.   The grandkids used the gym, rode bicycles for several hours on two separate occasions.  The employees at the hotel are always courteous.  Parking is not a problem, we like the garage, the elevator and that there are always plenty of luggage carts so we only have to make one trip to room.   Check out at 10 AM, is a bit early.  Wish they would move it up to at least 11.   We visited the last week of Oct/into Nov. Weather was beautiful, check out day it had rained during the night.  The entire week was
Manager Response: Thanks for sharing - we love hearing about our guests stays. You are welcome back any time.

Summary: Everything is ok.  Nothing spectacular...just ok.  Yes it’s across from the beach, which is nice...except trains run throughout the day and into the evening.  At least 20 a day.  You have to cross PCH to get across the street.  Doheny beach is not much of a layout beach.  Then take 51 steps up to a bridge that crosses over the train tracks and 51 steps down the other side.  And then back again...not really an issue for me but my husband whom had knee replacement a few months back was more of a challenge.  None the less, good exercise for both of us.  Couch feels like your sitting on cardboard and bed is sunken in the middle. TV’s are little..maybe 32”.    Surprised by a newly appointed $15 a day Resort Fee.  There should have been an email prior to arrival.  Never had this on a
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave your honest feedback. We appreciate you sharing your insights and are happy to hear that despite a few downsides, you and your husband were able to enjoy all of the great things we have to offer (like the bikes and full kitchens). Thank you for staying with us.

Summary: We made a vacation trade/exchange through RCI and enjoyed a pleasant stay ar rge beach for 4 night.  We had stayed next door 2 years prior and opted to try anither resort this year. We had a 1 bedroom suite that was spqcious and clean with a full kitchen and BBQ on the Balcony.  However we chose too eat out during our visit.  There were so many good places to choose from some within walking distance and many within a few minutes of the resort. The unit itself was clean and comfortable.  Although we did not have a view from the balcony it was relaxing and comfortable.  The bedroom was spacious, the bathroom very large with a jacuzzi tub, and the kitchen well stocked.  It was an older remodel but clean and comfortable and we would certainly look to return as the location was
Manager Response: Thank you, Jimmy, for the great review! We're happy you chose us for an exchange and enjoyed your stay.

Summary: Very restful, it is home away from home with the beach. It is functional, everything you need. Even the unit we stayed is outdated, the plumbing, aircon work well. They have activities but we did not participate. There is Dana Point Trolley that stop in front of the resort during summer time which we took advantage to go around Dana Point and transfer to Laguna Beach Trolley.
Manager Response: Thanks, Evelyn, for the great review!

Summary: Great resort in nice location. Across the street from the beach. So much to see and do in this area. The rooms are nice and give you plenty of space. You can request a mattress pad for the bed, which helps.  It's always nice to have a kitchen. Overall nice resort.
Manager Response: Hi Andrea - thank you for taking the time to review us. It's great to hear that you enjoyed your stay!

Summary: Room was dated but clean and equipped.  Staff was super responsive and friendly.  Lots of beach equipment readily available for use.  Location is great, you can walk over the bridge and you are at the Capistrano Beach, no need to drive and pay to park.  Directly next to a decent Mexican restaurant.  We got take out and it was great.
Manager Response: Thanks, Heather - we appreciate your great review! It's wonderful to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. Come back anytime.

Summary: The resort is showing definite improvement with the new management.  Every thing and every body were wonderful. The added activities are good.  Can't wait to see all the units upgraded.  The beach just across was very rocky therefore suggest you ask staff which better beach you should drive to.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review - we're happy to hear the improvements we've been working hard on are paying off. Appreciate your feedback!

Summary: Nice Rooms like an Apartment with a Full Kitchen, 1 or 2 Bedrooms, Living Room, 1 or 2 Bathrooms and a Balconey w Gas Grill. A lovely, small, quaint, and homey resort. Location is great in between Dana Point and San Clemente. Guests need to use crosswalk out front to cross Pac Coast Hwy and stairs over the train tracks to reach Doheny Beach which is known for its ROCKY beach. Nice for walks and bike rides. Traffic on PCH can be a little noisy. Along w the passing trains, which we have grown to love. Must request Ocean Front or guests will view the cliff in rear rooms. Free Bike Rentals and Free Beach Equipment. Small Pool and a Hot Tub. Close to New San Clemente Outlet Stores which holds an Awesome Car Show on Sat Mornings.
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review - appreciate you taking the time to share your insights with everyone. Come again anytime!

Summary: Capistrano Surfside Inn is outdated however, very clean, comfortable and has all accommodations. We are not a Timeshare owner. We called direct from a Resort website since that resort website claimed all places full. When I called Capistrano Surfside Inn direct number, I was greeted with care, and kindness. The clerk was very helpful. Upon arriving, we were happily greeted by front desk people.  The room was perfect. one of our guests sleep on the couch and didn't even pull out the sofa bed as the couch was extremely comfortable. The front desk personally brought us a pillow top cover for the sofa couch bed but we didn't use. The king master bedroom and queen bedroom was perfect. The vanity area was large enough in the master bedroom area and the queen bedroom has its own sink
Manager Response: Hi Patricia - thank you so much for taking the time to review us. We're happy to hear you had a wonderful time staying with us here at Capistrano Surfside Inn.

Summary Heading: Across the street from the beach and close to everything
Summary: The location is great and the room was all you need to have a supper week of sun and fun and the personnel are very friendly and anxious to please you. The resort has a pool and Jacuzzi plus they have bicycles you can check out plus beach chairs. They have a game room and an excerise room.
Manager Response: Thanks, Tim, for the 5-star rating! Glad you enjoyed your stay.

Summary: we stayed here for  8 days  the place is very clean , the staff is awesome very helpful , I was able to use the handicapped parking spot several times  but they only have the one  so it was  first come first severed  and thats  fair  as I used a spot near by or in the underground parking. the pool while small is perfect for cooling off  and relaxing in  as is the hot tub.   the beach was awesome as well as  you could listen to the waves at night  while relaxing on the balcony.    the units came fully equipped  which was nice and was not far from shopping  we  used costco .  I would stay there again with out a problem   the drive into disneyland   was no problem also  as we went early  each day  ..
Manager Response: Hi Louie & Betty - thanks for the great review! Sounds like you had a great stay with us and enjoyed Disneyland.

Summary Heading: full kitchen and big personal spa!!
Summary: this resort was exactly what I was looking for! we will be staying again! it is not like a typical hotel as they ask that you pick up after yourself but you have a complete kitchen and a large size personal spa so its great for some personal R&R. My husband loves to cook so having the full kitchen was perfect! and its so close to the water! its a bit awkward because you have to go over the train tracks using stairs to get to the wather but we will likely be staying again!!!
Manager Response: Hi Jessica - thank you so much for the wonderful review. We would be happy to have you come back anytime.

Summary: Impressive Facillity and fabulous Staff make for an enjoyable experience in  spending Time here. Lots to see and do in a great and relaxing environment. We have a wonderful time each and every time we stay here, . Tom and Disne Joyce.  Tournament of Roses
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review! It's wonderful to hear that folks love to come back again and again.

Summary Heading: Had a Wonderful stay at Surfside Inn!!!
Summary: This resort is Fabulous and the staff knows the true value of customer service. The staff is very friendly and helpful. The bedrooms are spacious and very comfortable.Location of this resort is excellent, right across from the beach and the hotel lets you check out beach chairs,umbrellas,beach toys and bikes. I would highly recommend this resort to everyone who is looking for a good stay and beachside fun!!!! And thank you Amanda, Wade and hotel stuff for going above and belong to making our stay absolutely amazing!!!
Manager Response: Thank you so much - reviews like this give us motivation! We always put our guests first and it's great to see what we do here at Capistrano Surfside Inn is making a difference.

Summary: My husband has been coming to Surfside since he was a small child. Nothing extravagant about it but clean & meets our needs! We are always happy with our stay here and its in a great location in Southern California. We always stay in an oceanfront 2 BR 2 Bath unit. The resort has beach chairs , sand toys & bikes to checkout which is a great bonus when traveling by air & long distances.
Manager Response: Thanks Kelly! We're always happy to have guests who return again and again. Happy you enjoy your time with us here at Capistrano Surfside Inn.

Summary: We stayed at 7 time share resorts and hotels on our recent trip and this was the best of the bunch. Everything was great. It is located right across the street from the beach. It is easy to get to and has free dedicated parking on site. The building is not especially remarkable but every part is beautifully maintained. It has a very nice small pool and hot tub right out front. The room was wonderful. It has lots of space, very nicely decorated and all new. There was nothing old or worn out like several RCI resorts we have been to. The beach-facing balcony is enclosed just enough that we were very comfortable even with a pretty strong wind. There is a large high-end barbecue grill on the balcony, completely clean and ready to go. I think I could live there for a while.
Manager Response: Oh my... best of the bunch! That's so great to hear. Thank you, Allen, for such a wonderful review.

Summary: We have been staying here annually for many years...since it was first built. It is a great location with the beach right across the PCH...not more than a half a block's walk. The hotel is centrally located near Dana Point and provides ample space for stretching out for a long-deserved break. Each room has a kitchen so you can cook for yourself or eat out at many of the nearby restaurants...even next door. Most rooms sleep 4 easily with the Sea Captains at the ends, comfortably fitting a larger family. Great place to stay to unwind.
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review - come back again sometime!

Summary Heading: Disgusting in More Ways Than One
Summary: This place is disgusting in more ways than one. We used Hotels Tonight to book a room here. Upon check-in they didn't have our reservation on file, but in the end they were able to find us a room. The room spelled like cat urine and the shower flooded the entire bathroom. A squeegee on a stick was their solution to this problem.  In the morning the hotel staff was apologetic and admitted that the bathroom floor wasn't graded correctly and that they've been trying to get the urine smell out of the room for a long time. They said they would try and get us a full refund.  The General Manager Amanda Burgess rejected the refund request twice. The rationale was that we didn't complain during our stay, that there were other rooms available, and that the room didn't smell or have
Manager Response: Noah, we would like the opportunity to address your concerns. Please reach out to us directly at (949) 240-7681.

Summary: Great spot across from the beach. Nice rooms, fun guests hanging at the jacuzzi,  and considerate staff. This is a great weekend for those couples seeking a relaxing getaway. We met some very chill couples at the pool. Pretty soon we were all great friends and sharing ice chests, and amazing 300 dollar bottle tequila.  I'd gladly return to this hidden gem.
Manager Response: HI Chad - happy to hear you discovered our "hidden gem." Come back any time!

Summary: Though Capistrano Surfside Inn is a bit dated, the friendly, accommodating staff, the spacious unit and the great location made up for any desire for a newer resort.  In fact, the unit was very quiet unlike what one often experiences in new resorts with little soundproofing between the units.  The trip to California was a high school graduation present for my 18 year old granddaughter and the location of Capistrano Surfside Inn was perfect for our California vacation.
Manager Response: Hello Barbara. We are so pleased you enjoyed your visit to Capistrano Surfside Inn! Thank you for the top rating! It's a joy to hear your family had a perfect experience. Have a great day!

Summary: My family comes to surfside every year and it's been a wonderful place to stay. The staff is very welcoming & friendly. The rooms are large and we'll kept. Absolutely love the balconies! Hands down best place to stay!
Manager Response: Thank you, Michelle, for reaching out to us. Your opinion plays an integral part in our customer service. We truly appreciate your compliments. You really made our day. Wishing you a great day until the next time we meet.

Summary: Im an owner and love this place and location. The staff is awesome and I go every year. Its beautiful and worth going to. Enjoy the view. Lots to go see and visit. The train is nearby for easy commutes.
Manager Response: Thank you, Gina, for reaching out to us. Your opinion plays an integral part in our customer service. We thank you for being one of our amazing owners! Hurry back...we’re certainly expecting you!

Summary: Capistrano Surfside Inn is a great place to relax:  besides its great location by the beach, the entire staff is a happy, helpful group to be around with.  The location is convenient - close to a major freeway, several grocery stores around the area, and a major outlet store is nearby for shoppers who love the outlet malls (like me).
Manager Response: Virginiab620, thank you for taking the time to leave us feedback. We truly appreciate your kind words about our resort. We’re especially grateful for your kind comments about our hardworking team. Our fantastic team works hard to ensure your vacation experience is nothing short of amazing. See you next time!

Summary: This vacation came at the perfect time. We had never been to this resort before as they had just joined the GPX family and when I saw a bonus week I bought it. We can't wait to come back, perfect location great units, we loved everything about this place. They bent over backwards to make our stay the best it could be. Augustina and Cynthia (I believe) at the front desk were awesome!!! We own in Carlsbad at Seapointe and Surfside Inn is a great alternative. If you're in town you must try Turks at the harbor in Dana Point for the fish & chips, best I've ever had. Go to Mollies across from the Mission for breakfast and if you want authentic Mexican food there is a little hole in the wall place called El Coyotito that makes their tortillas homemade everything we had there was really
Manager Response: Hi Carrie.  Thank you for staying with us and sharing your feedback. We truly appreciate your kind words about our resort. We're glad you enjoyed your first stay with us and we can't wait to host you again. See you next time!

Summary: We have owned two weeks for several years and always visit in December/January and February.  It is an older property, but immaculate and the 37 units have a "feel" like a bed and breakfast.  The staff is the best, and it is right across from Doheny Beach so you can hear the surf and enjoy the ocean from your room.  Wade, Cynthia, Amanda and Augustina always make us feel like we are staying in a bed and breakfast with a very personal touch.
Manager Response: Glendamichael, thank you for taking the time to leave us feedback. We have taken the liberty of sharing your kind appreciation with the whole team, as it is feedback such as yours that motivates us to achieve higher levels of services and standards.

Summary: We visited end of November. The weather was wonderful!!  I requested a room we were familiar with, and found it had not been updated, but that was not a problem.  We were shown the updated rooms and they are very nice. Next time.    I chose our room as it was close to the elevator.  There were a few quirks but nothing that wasn't taken care of right away.   We had a comfortable stay.  Both my daughter and I are a bit gimpy, we found Wade the maintenance man and he helped with luggage and whatever else we may have needed. Very helpful.  The whole crew at the hotel from the front desk to the housekeepers are very polite and always willing to help.  Our timeshare is at this property and each time we come we enjoy it very much.  I would definitely recommend.  For you who are worried
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: WOW. A Must stay Beach Resort/Timeshare destination in Capistrano Beach, CA
Summary: A few years ago, due to fog on a New Years eve in Medford, OR. we time banked a timeshare week at Solana Beach to Trading Places and forgot about it. Some weeks ago we started getting e-mails from Trading Places about the time banked week, and made inquiry. Long story short we made reservation for our time banked week at Capistrano Beach Inn, Capistrano Beach, CA contiguous to Dana Point Harbor for this past Nov. 4-11, 2016. Best vacation decision and stay we've EVER MADE.  Right off the ocean, and 5 minutes from Dana Point Harbor and San Juan Capistrano, next door in close walking distance to 5 star Agostinos Italian Restaurant and Olamendis Mexican Restaurant, and superb accommodations. Wow, how can you beat it? We were fortunate that we got a Sea Captain, 2BD/2 bath unit.
Manager Response: WOW! Thank YOU. We strive to make your stay memorable and your kinds words really touch us! Your review was shared with our team and Wade will be recognized for the excellent service he provided you (as he does with all of our guests). Thank you so much for taking the time to write this review and share your experience and feedback with us and your fellow travelers. We hope to have you as our guest again!  Amanda Burgess, General Manager

Summary Heading: Excellent location for a wonderful week in California
Summary: The location and the comfort of the Surfside Inn would be hard to match when visiting seaside California. Our one bedroom unit was clean and inviting. It was more than adequate for a lovely fall week at the beach. The oversize jacuzzi tub in our bathroom was a surprise, but perhaps Boomer-age surfer guests who desire a soak use theirs. There is an outdoor hot tub and pool overlooking the Pacific Coast Highway and the ocean. The kitchen was well-equipped and the outdoor grill on our balcony was a big plus. Even though we took advantage of the great restaurants in the area, we grilled three nights of our stay. Not many places offer a grill with each unit and this definitely was a plus in our book.  This was our second stay here and we were pleased to have an ocean view. However
Manager Response: Hi Eva, Thank you so much for taking the time to post a review. We appreciate the kind words! It sounds like you really enjoyed your stay with us and we're so happy to hear it! Hopefully you can come stay with us again soon! Amanda Burgess, General Manager

Summary Heading: Wonderful Location Across the Street from Doheny State Beach!
Summary: Just spent a wonderful week at the Capistrano Surfside Inn.  The check-in was the easiest we have ever experienced.  We were immediately offered help with our luggage.The wonderful front desk staff was so efficient and friendly and the resort manager personally welcomed us. Our spacious 2 bedrm, 1 full bath with separate sink in 2nd bdrm., wonderful ocean views across the street from Doheny Beach, fully equipped kitchen, comfortably furnished, ceiling fans in both bdrms, central air, sparkling pool overlooks ocean, gas BBQ on the balcony of every unit.  Free wifi with excellent technician available if questions. Great location: Costco 5 minutes away, Walmart, Target, Dana Point for our whale watching excursion, San Juan Capistrano Mission including garden tour, Hennessey's
Manager Response: Carole, Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review. We're so glad you enjoyed your stay with us! We would love to have you as our guest again soon!  Amnanda Burgess, General Manager

Summary: We loved it so peaceful and soothing so much privacy nobody even bothers you there you can do whatever you like you just enjoy  your self completly and what a great ocean view you have. it was awsome  and very clean
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to post a review! Glad to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. Please come back and stay with us again soon! Amanda Burgess, General Manager

Summary: The Capistrano Surfside Inn is a comfortable pleasant place to stay in an excellent location.   Half the units are Oceanside with an awesome view of the ocean – and one just walks across the road to the beach!  The location is very close to Dana Point and it's charming Harbor, and close to lovely charming Southern California towns such as San Clemente, San Juan Capistrano, Laguna Beach, Newport Beach, etc.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to post a review. Your positive words are really appreciated. We're so glad you enjoyed your time with us, both at the resort and in the area. Please come back and be our guest again soon! Amanda Burgess, General Manager

Summary: People all still awesome, but property needs better oversight on the upgrades.  Waves are eating up the beach and most of the palms roots are exposed. The dolphin and whale are very active in the waters of this area. Overall a wonderful time with good friends
Manager Response: Sharon, Thank you so much for taking the time to post a review. I agree with your opener "people all still awesome, but property needs better oversight on the upgrades." Our staff IS AWESOME! We are in the process of upgrading our units, I hope you had the opportunity to see one of the ungraded units, they are fantastic! We have a plan in place to get all the units this way, although it will take some time since we don't want to increase our owner's maintenance fees too drastically. I'm so glad you mentioned the dolphin and whale activities, it's one of the MUST SEE activities when you visit this area. I'm so glad you enjoyed your stay with us and hope you return soon! Amanda Burgess, General Manager

Summary: We had an ocean view which we loved. We were on the third floor. all the rooms feature a balcony which we enjoyed. The balcony had a barbecue and we did steaks one evening for dinner. We sat on the balcony and played Mexican Train one afternoon.which was lovely. The train did not bother us. The traffic seemed more noisy but when in the condo with the door closed you couldn't hear the noise. The couch had seen its better days but the rest of the furniture was fine. The condo was clean and had everything we needed. We brought our own pillow since we live in California and drove. It was close to everything and we would go back.
Manager Response: Mary J, Thank you so much for taking the time to post a review! And we agree that the train is not bothersome and rather just part of the SoCal beach culture. The resort has double paned windows and sliding glass doors so the traffic noise in non-existent when you close up the unit. I'm so glad you enjoyed your stay with us, we'd love to have your as our guest again!  Amanda Burgess, General Manager

Summary Heading: Casual Condos Right on the Beach
Summary: Its really hard to beat the location of these condos at Capistrano Beach. It is right across the street from Doheney State Park with surfing, paddle board, volleyball, picnic facilities, fire pits etc. We slept with the windows open to hear the waves rolling all night, which was awesome except for the intermittent train going by across the street (but by the end of the week we barely noticed).   The southern Orange County location is convenient to most of the attractions in the Anaheim and San Diego regions as it is situated right in the middle of the two destinations. Weather is almost always perfect, no matter the season.   As for the facilities, they are beginning to be dated, but for a beach property they are adequate. Every room has a balcony with a BBQ and table/chairs, I
Manager Response: Carrons, Thank you so much for taking the time to post a review. I think you painted a perfect picture of our resort and it's FANTASTIC location! I couldn't have said it better myself! Also- we are renovating the rooms so that "dated look" will be a comment of the past the next time you come to stay with us. And yes, EVERY unit has a living room, dining room, and fully equipped kitchen as well as a private balcony with BBQ grill. I am so glad you enjoyed your stay with us and please come stay with us again!  Amanda Burgess, General Manager

Summary: This place is OK, not great. The location and staff are positives, but there is a lot more negative with this place. The main thing is that the furniture is SO uncomfortable. The couch was hard and awkward. The bed was overly soft with hard overstuffed pillows. Our necks couldn't take it. We tried the pullout couch which was awful. You could feel the springs and bars. The giant spa tub in our room was gross. There was stains and hair in it. Yuck. The water in the shower never got past lukewarm.   We were a bit baffled by all of the weird rules. If you are staying as part of a timeshare or using points you have to pay $20 if you want your bed changed or floor vacuumed. The alternative is counting and placing your dirty linens and towels in a bag outside your door and they replace
Manager Response: Hello T381, First, thank you so much for taking the time to post a review, we really appreciate it. I appreciate the feedback about the location, and even more so, the kind words about the staff. They are AMAZING hard-working people who try their hardest to make sure your stay is memorable. Those big jetted tubs in the rooms (from 1985) - are on their way out! About 1/2 of the rooms no longer have those tubs and as we renovate we are replacing them with a much smaller tub. We have a plan in place to renovate the rest of our rooms, diligently removing that "80's vibe" from those remaining rooms. ;0) There are different "rules" in place for our timeshare guests and our renters. Timeshare guests do receive a mid-week towel/linen exchange and renters receive daily maid-service. The strict 10am check-out time is on Sundays only, we are more flexible mid-week. I believe most hotels/resorts have a security deposit required at check-in, ours is $100, it's in all of our documentation. I'm glad you took advantage of our FREE bike rentals, it really is the best way to explore the area. But we definitely do NOT recommend playing "frogger" to cross PCH, there is a traffic signal less then 2 blocks down where you can safely cross the street with the bikes (no stairs) to access the beach path. And next time you stay with us, please mention that someone will be using the pull-out sleeper, we can add a pillow-topper that makes the pullout mattress more comfortable. I hope you and your family enjoyed your stay with us, had a memorable & fantastic vacation, and will return to stay with us again!  Again, we ALWAYS appreciate feedback and you taking your time to share your opinions with fellow travelers.  Amanda Burgess, General Manager

Summary Heading: Great location and we love the staff
Summary: We have visited this resort for years. There are positives and negatives with this property, though since we keep coming back, obviously the positives out weight the negatives. It is an older California beach property. The Pacific Coast Highway runs right in front as well as the train track. But, the ocean is right there too.  I can easily look over the road and the occasional trains that go by to enjoy the beautiful ocean views.  The staff is always so helpful and kind. We ride the bikes they have on site, and enjoy the full kitchens and BBQ on the decks.  We enjoy hiking in the area and even saw some whale on our hike to the Dana Point Headlands. If you like high end hotels, this is not your place, but we like this homey resort with an ocean view.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to post a review. I feel your review very accurately describes our resort. I'm glad you enjoyed your stay with us and we look forward to your return visit.  Amanda Burgess, General Manager

Summary: To Whom it May Concern: I just completed a week at the Capistrano Surfside Inn which was an exchange through Trading Places. I feel that the folks at Trading Places did us a disservice  by failing to inform us that the $764.00 for a week in this place would have us facing a mound of dirt in the back of the resort. Nowhere in the Confirmation that we received, nor in the information pages of the resort is there any mention that ex-changers would end up in one of these substandard units. Also, after registering our complaint with the manager at the Inn, we were informed that Trading Places was responsible for informing incoming guests that they had 30 days in advance of their arrival to "request" an ocean facing unit. Trading Places did NOT inform us of that either.  Having been a
Manager Response: Hello Mr. Miller, Anytime you do a timeshare exchange, I recommend that once you have a confirmed exchange you contact that resort directly to ask them how they assign the rooms. Every resort does it a different way. The exchange paperwork states that you are not guaranteed a particular view. However, we allow our owners to call in 3 months in advance of the arrival date to request a room assignment and exchange guests to call in 1 month in advance of the arrival date to request a room assignment. We have no record of you calling in, you arrived on check-in day assuming that you would have an ocean-view. Since this is a resort where a majority of the owners use their week rather then give it to the exchange companies, sometimes even calling 1 month in advance won't guarantee you ocean-view because the owners have reserved them all. Despite being in a non-ocean-view room I hope you found the resort to be clean and well maintained and the staff to be professional, helpful and friendly. I hope you took advantage of our free bikes and enjoyed all that this beautiful beach town has to offer. You rated our resort as a 2, but your review indicates your grievance is not with the resort but with the exchange company. I do hope you come back to stay with us again in the future and if so please call us 1 month in advance of your arrival date so we can assign an ocean-view room to you if one is available. Happy Travels, Amanda Burgess, General Manager

Summary: We enjoyed our stay in a 1 Bedroom spacious condo.  Being there Christmas week, we were with a lot of families, asking for a quiet room, we were on the 3rd floor & bank view - so we didn't have the kids running overhead or have the highway & train noise, although you'll have to go out to see the fabulous sunsets.  Our condo smelled a bit - like wet carpet, which dissipated when we open the doors.  The resort has bikes & lots of beach gear - chairs & umbrellas, every deck has a nice gas BBQ grill.  Dana Point is a wonderful area & an easy trip from Disneyland & Orange County Airport.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post a review. I'm glad to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. I'm sorry to hear you unit smelled like wet carpet, we do have to clean our carpets often because of their exposure to sand and sunblock being this close to the beach. I'm glad it dissipated quickly. It's great you and your family took advantage of the free bikes, it really is the best way to explore! Thanks for the great review, please come stay with us again in the future! Happy Travels, Amanda Burgess

Summary Heading: Decent Location, Decent Place - 10 AM checkout
Summary: The rooms are timeshare rooms, cheesy plastic signs inside the room.   A bit of a moldy smell so better than a motel but not much more - first impression of lobby is that your walking into a tiled motel - hard to explain but not thrilling to be here   10 AM checkout is really early don't you think ?
Manager Response: TahoeBlue, Thanks for taking the time to post a review. As you indicated, our resort is not like a modern, trendy hotel in a downtown metropolitan area. It's more like your personal beach-house. We have cleaned and well maintained rooms, even if they are a little dated. We have a professional, helpful, and friendly staff. Hopefully your took advantage of the free bikes and heated ocean-view pool & hot-tub. If you'd like to stay with us again, please request one of the renovated rooms. We are in the process of modernizing our units and we do have a few that may be more what you are looking for. Also, here's a secret: ASK for an early check-out. We can accommodate a later check-out any day except Sunday. Happy Travels, Amanda Burgess, General Manager

Summary Heading: Coffee on the Balcony with Ocean View
Summary: My family of 5 stayed here for a week as a RCI timeshare exchange the week before Christmas week.  Check in was Sunday so I also rented a stay for Saturday to start the vacation an extra day.  At first we were assigned a separate room for Saturday and then the resort would move us on Sunday for our week stay room.  However, the resort surprised us by giving us the same room on Saturday so that we didn't have to move on Sunday.  That was GREAT customer service!  After check-in I went to the desk and asked for more pillows.  The clerk and I walked to storage rooms to find them.  Another great customer service experience.  She could've easily said Housekeeping is closed for the day.  Room 217 is a 2 bedroom/1 bath corner unit.  The room was cozy, yet big enough for our family.  We
Manager Response: WOW! Thank you for taking the time to post such a detailed review! I'm so glad you and your family had such a great stay with us. First, there was AC in your unit, each unit has it's own air conditioner. And second the elevator is shut off at night for security, but you can request for the front desk agent to turn it on if you need it. Sounds like you and your family truly took advance of all that our resort has to offer: free bikes, heated pool, walking distance to the beach, and a 40 minute drive to Disneyland. Thank you for the feedback regarding your experience with our front desks agents, we are do have some amazing people on our staff that really strive to give the best vacation experience possible. It makes me so happy to hear your stay was memorable and we would be honored to have you as our guests again! Happy Travels, Amanda Burgess, General Manager

Summary Heading: Great spot very close to the ocean!!
Summary: This was a great time share condo! The 24 hour staff was friendly and helpful! Our condo was a little dated but very clean and well maintained. The fully stocked kitchen was very handy for preparing our own meals. There was even a grill on the patio if you're so inclined!
Manager Response: Hello Audry, Thank you for taking the time to post a review. I think your words are spot on. We'd love to have your as our guest again! Happy Travels, Amanda Burgess, General Manager

Summary: This was a great place to stay if you are looking for somewhere not in LA or San Diego but right in the middle between the two.  My family and I had a great vacation for 8 days that included trips to San Diego and Anaheim for Disneyland.  It was an amazing trip and staying at the Capistrano Surfside Inn made it even better.  First of all the best thing was the staff, everyone we met had a smile and were always willing to help.   They were very knowledgeable about the area and were always willing to lend a helping hand to ensure our great stay.  They had a big room with a pool table and couches and a tv where we could hang out as a family and watch football or movies and do other things.  Their pool and hot-tub were great amenities as well that allowed for a fun and relaxing
Manager Response: Dr.Koufax, Thank you so much for the glowing review! We do have an amazing staff and an amazing resort! I'm glad we were the perfect fit to your vacation. Being centrally located between San Diego and LA allows you to enjoy visiting each city during the day while returning to your quite quaint beach resort in the evenings. We appreciate your kind words and we'd love to have you come stay with us again. Happy Travels,  Amanda Burgess, General Manager

Summary: The timeshare is conveniently situated close to freeways and to Pacific Coast Highway with a host of restaurants, boutques, big bag shopping and supermarkets, including the wonderful Gelsons.  The resort units are tastefully furnished with barbecue pits and lounge chairs on the balconies, inside are full sized refrigerator and stove, master bedroom (Sea Captain unit) and spa tub in the bathroom.  Front desk is helpful and cooperative - lounge area is good place to relax while you are doing the laundry in the next room.
Manager Response: Traveler5, Thank you so much for taking the time to post a review. I'm glad to hear that our resort was the perfect fit for your vacation. We'd love to have you come stay with us again! Happy Travels,  Amanda Burgess, General Manager

Summary: We stayed here as a time share swap, and thoroughly enjoyed the room and location. However, what made the place excellent is - as you'd imagine -  the people. Not only was the Monday morning, 9am briefing informative, but the person giving it (sorry, I do not have individual names, unfortunately) was quite well  informed and directed us to Salt Creek beach, which we thought was an excellent recommendation, and quite different (many more beach-goers) from the beach directly in front of the property.  When it came to printing directions and tour / trip receipts, the front office staff could not have been of more assistance and help.   A huge plus ...: the Inn provided beach chairs, umbrellas and beach towels during our stay -  just sign 'em out and return each day - a tremendous
Manager Response: Dennis, Thank you so much for taking the time to post a review. And thank you so much for your kind words. We're happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. I will pass your comments on to the staff especially Patricia, who conducts the Monday Morning orientation. We love what we do and we're glad it shows. I hope you and your wife have fond memories of your vacation with us and we'd love to have you come stay with us again in the future! Amanda Burgess, General Manager

Summary: Stayed for only one night, but definitely worth a re-visit for a longer stay.  Had a wonderful room on 2nd floor with view of ocean, porch with table and chairs and BBQ grill.  There is some noise from traffic on Pacific Coast Highway, but definitely not bothersome to me.  Clean and neat facility, thoroughly enjoyed and would recommend highly.
Manager Response: We're so glad you enjoyed your stay with us! Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review. Hopefully next time you're able to stay with us for a longer stay! Vacationing is good for the soul! Amanda Burgess, General Manager

Summary: We really like this place and come back to it for a timeshare week every spring.  It is more like a home, with a kitchen, barbecue on the balcony and separate bedroom with a king size bed.  They have free bike rental and several easy rides to the beach and tourist shopping.  The resort is close to theaters and restaurants and Costco! (For gas or whatever)  They have a heated pool with jacuzzi.  Staff are friendly and helpful.  One dot docked due to noise.  We have had rooms in the back that face a hillside and those rooms are very quiet.  This year, we had a room facing the beach.  The view is awesome, but Highway 1 runs between the hotel and the beach.  The train runs through the area on a regular schedule, but the street noise was the problem.   This does not keep us away, but
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review. We love the feedback.  And it's very helpful for you to mention (to those looking to stay with us) that the non-ocean facing units do have the advantage of being quieter!  We'll see you next year, Amanda Burgess, General Manager

Summary: We traded for this place and found it to be wonderful.  The staff is very friendly and always helpful.  Free bike rentals, movie rentals and pool room.    Spacious rooms with a jacuzzi tub make this a great place.  Right across the road from Capistrano beach......however there are much better beaches not too far away
Manager Response: Rick_Sue1969, Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review, it means the world to us. I'm thrilled you enjoyed your stay. Come back and see us again. Amanda Burgess, General Manager

Summary Heading: Close to the beach and bicycles!
Summary: I was a little taken aback by the pedestrian nature of the accommodations. This is not resort lodging like many timeshare properties. If you want clean linens, you strip your beds and gather your towels, bag them, leave them outside your door, and clean ones are delivered.  Nothing quite like coming home after a long day and having to make your beds. Wait, that is just like home!  It was across the street from Capo Beach; the only things between us and the beach are Highway 1 and the trains.  We adapted to the noise and appreciated the adjacent walkway over the aforementioned tracks and highway.  We took bikes out, they were custom fitted for us, and rode for miles on the pathways along the beach,  that was a great time!  The food in the 'hood is bar or family Mexican.  The
Manager Response: Joe,  Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review. I'm glad you and your family took advantage of the free bikes, it really is the best way to experience the area. Happy to hear that the view from your unit overshadowed the noise of the traffic/trains, although I agree with you: it's easy to adapt to the noise (the double-paned windows help!). We find the trains to be part of the southern California beach culture that makes this place so memorable! We are thrilled you enjoyed your stay and hope you come stay with us again in the future.  Amanda Burgess, General Manager

Summary: enjoyed a week via a timeshare exchange. Fantastic accommodations.  Spacious lodgings overlooking the ocean.  A plus was a porch with a gas grill which we used two times while enjoying our sunsets and wine!  Very clean in unit and staff constantly seen cleaning the halls, mopping the floors in the hallway and laundry areas.  Would highly recommend as an exchange!
Manager Response: We are so pleased you enjoyed your stay with us! Thank you so much for taking the time to post a review, it makes our day to hear that you had a fantastic vacation! We hope you come to visit us again ;0) Amanda Burgess, General Manager

Summary Heading: On the edge of the Pacific Ocean
Summary: One of our favorite vacation destinations is the Capistrano Surfside Inn.  We have been so impressed with this outstanding resort.  The suites are large and well appointed.  The kitchen is fully stocked and with a full size refrigerator,  stove with full oven and all of the rest of the tools that make cooking a pleasure.  We have even made oven baked bread to perfection.  The bedrooms and bathrooms are large and comfortable.  Each bathroom has a Jacuzzi bath.   The swimming pool and spa are nice and well maintained. One of the best aspects of this amazing resort is the management and staff.  They are consistently available to help with a wonderful attitude.   Probably the best feature of the resort is the location, affording gorgeous ocean views, close enough to watch the waves
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to post a review! Glad to hear you enjoyed your stay with us (again)! Keep the feedback coming, we find it invaluable! And we will strive to continue to improve based on our guests comments and suggestions. We look forward to your next stay.    Amanda Burgess, General Manager

Summary Heading: This is more of a motel quality place
Summary: We arrived at 9:45pm to a sopping wet floor in the bathroom (yuck), grey foul smelling water coming up from the drain of the bathroom sink, a disgusting scrub brush (to think it was used to clean the room!) and not a shred of toilet paper in the unit.  We got a backside unit which was very out of date with a view of a brown dirt from the balcony.    The garbage disposal had a sign instructing us not to use it.  The toilet ran (and it took two maintenance calls to get it fixed - the first time they came they didn't fix it).  There is a drought - fix it!    The place felt dirty.  I had my whole family where their shoes on the carpet.  Just yuck.
Manager Response: I'm so sorry this was your experience with us! I wish really we had spoken about the problems you experienced while you were still here with us so I had the opportunity to make it right with you. Thank you for your time on the phone the other day, I appreciate all the feedback. I hope you come back and give us the chance to make a second impression.  Amanda Burgess, General Manager

Summary: Our experience with the staff right from the beginning was wonderful and we appreciated how accommodating they were. The location was perfect. We were able to walk on the beach each morning. We had marshmallow roasts on the beach. We loved the accommodations available; bikes, beach chairs, pool table, pool, hot tub, movies, and friendly staff. It was nice to have a full kitchen to refrigerate, prepare, and store food. The rooms are dated but were very comfortable and clean. The electrical outlets are not in convenient places for charging phones/iPads at bedsides. Our kids loved how the staff were so friendly with them and helpful when they checked out movies. All the beds were comfortable. We stayed in a variety of rooms (due to last minute arrangements on our part) and were
Manager Response: Jeffery, We are so glad your family had a great stay with us! Sounds like you and your family really took the time to enjoy and explore all that our area has to offer. Give us a call when you're ready to plan your next stay with us, hopefully with some advance notice we can keep you in the same room for the whole length of your stay ;0) Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review, your feed back means the world to us. We look forward to your return visit.   Amanda Burgess, General Manager

Summary: We (my daughter, 3 year old granddaughter and a friend) were very pleased with our ocean view room. I particularly liked the balcony. We were unable to find a few things in the kitchen, but we  immediately got help. The rooms were clean, brightly decorated and spacious. The kitchen was well stocked with necessary dishes and etc. The over-the-road-to-the-beach bridge was right outside the front door! I can't find any negatives!
Manager Response: I am so glad you enjoyed your stay with us! The weather was so perfect this weekend too. Thank you so much for taking the time to post a review, we hope you come and stay with us again soon.  Amanda Burgess, General Manager

Summary: We traded our timeshare week through our vacation club trade service with a request for central West Coast beach area. This Resort fit the bill. I didn't see any reviews before booking, but they have found us good properties before so I didn't hesitate with pulling the trigger.   We had a 2/2 on the third floor end.(see room tips). In a word: ROOMY! The master bath has a Jacuzzi tub w/shower. The vanity is in the bedroom so the mirror doesn't fog up (witch is helpful when going out.) The second bedroom was as big as the master and the second bath was smallish  with a shower, vanity & toilet together. Both bedrooms had King beds and very comfortable. Lots of closet space.  Huge balcony with gas BBQ. Kitchen,         Large  Living room,   ditto  Dining room,  ditto.  The rooms are
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to post a review. I'm so glad you enjoyed your stay with us, it sounds like you made the most of your vacation by visiting all that the area has to offer! We'd love to have you come stay with us again in the future.  Amanda Burgess, General Manager

Summary Heading: Location, Location, Location! -- Right across from Doheny State Beach
Summary: We chose this place through VRI.  We've also stayed at two other great properties: San Clemente Inn and Winner's Circle in Del Mar.  We live in a very quiet home in a very quiet neighborhood.  We were a little concerned about the road noise at Surfside Inn.  It was not an issue.  We were surprised how easily we got used to it, though the Pacific Highway and the train are between the Surfside Inn and Doheny State Beach.  The Surfliner, Metrolink and freight trains go by frequently.  (See photo below.)  For the most part, the sound you hear, especially at night, is the pleasant crashing of waves.  Agustina, at the front desk, was very pleasant and helpful.  The property manager, Amanda, did an orientation that was excellent too.  She made some great recommendations that we took
Manager Response: What an excellent and detailed review. Thank you so much for taking the time to post. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay and we look forward to having you as our guest again in the future.

Summary Heading: 24 Years Later It's Still My Favorite
Summary: I have been an owner at the Capistrano Surfside Inn since 1990.  I never considered giving it up and gone there every single year.  I like it so much, I bought a second unit and spend another week there in the Winter.  It is definitely one of the good things in my life.  In recent years, the management of the property has improved significantly with Ms. Burgess.  ALL FIVE STARS!
Manager Response: This review made my week! It means the world to us to have our long-standing owners express their delight in SurfSide Inn. It's the owners like you that help this resort to maintain it's cozy beach environment that our owners love to come to and we enjoy to work in. Thanks for the positive feedback and we'll see you next year!  Amanda Burgess, General Manager

Summary Heading: Nice stay, property a little dated.
Summary: It's a nice and laid back hotel, not a party resort. There is quite a bit of road noise. the property overall is old but kept in decent shape. There are lots of stores and restaurants a short drive from there. Staff is pleasant.
Manager Response: Glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Thanks for taking the time to post a review. Hope to see you again! ;0) Amanda Burgess, General Manager

Summary: It is nice to see independent well managed, nicely appointed timeshare properties.  I've stayed at Hiltons, Marriott's, Diamond Resort properties that are nice but all very corporate.  The Capistrano Surfside has the charm and warmth of a family managed business.  The property is clean, with nice common areas.  We stayed in a 2 bedroom unit which was huge, nicely furnished with comfortable bedding, good linens and a quality sleep experience.  The property is just across the Pacific Coast Highway from Doheny Beach (immortalized by the Beach Boy's Song) and is in close proximity to great restaurants and area attractions.  Management at Capistrano Surfside was gracious and very helpful with our questions.
Manager Response: Hooray! Another satisfied customer! It was a pleasure seeing you and your wife and thank you so much for taking the time to post a review. We try our best to be sure you have the best vacation experience possible and your feedback means so much to us. I hope you are successful in purchasing a 2BR, we would love to have you as an owner with us!

Summary: We spent 3 days here. This was the perfect place to relax and rest after a hectic wedding. We spent long stretches of time in the whirlpool tub, walking along the beach and sitting on our balcony staring at the pelicans in the surf, leaving “home” only once a day to eat dinner in one of the beautiful waterfront restaurants in Dana Point and Laguna Beach. Otherwise, we were content just to soak in the peace and quietude at our apartment. Ahhh…a perfect 3 days for us.  If the traveler is looking for lots of activity, bar-hopping or shopping in the immediate area, this is not the place.    Amanda, the general manager, was very kind to us and upon learning that we were honeymooning, gave us a voucher for a round of drinks at the restaurant next door. Very nice gesture, Amanda! Thank
Manager Response: I'm so glad you enjoyed your honeymoon! Thanks for spending it with us. It was a pleasure meeting you both and we look forward for you coming back to stay with us for your anniversary ;0)

Summary: The Capistrano Surfside Inn is a cute little boutique hotel across from Doheny State Beach.  The decor is dated and the carpet was stained, but the unit had everything we needed for a great and comfortable stay.  We were in unit 211 and we had an oceanview.  All units are equipped with everything from home, i.e., kitchen utensils, pots & pans, full sized appliances, shampoo, conditioner, beach towels, digital clock, flat screen TVs, BBQ, etc.  You can rent DVDs at the front desk and keep them for 24 hours.  You can also rent (for free) bikes, beach chairs, umbrellas, boogey boards and sand toys.  It was awesome!  They even have a work-out room and pool table.  Parking is free for 1 vehicle and $10 thereafter.  Please be advised they do not allow pets.  If you get caught, you
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind words! We are glad you enjoyed your visit and look forward to seeing you again in the future. We'll get on those carpets ;0)

Summary: This is an update to my 9/1/2012 review I wrote about my annual 1 week vacation, at my Capo Beach timeshare.  There is some new furniture, but the main attraction is the location and the view of the ocean/beach.  If you want large bedrooms, see if a Sea Captain 2BR 2BA unit is available on the San Clemente side of the resort. If one is available, be sure to bring lots of clothes to hang in the HUGE bedroom closets. I challenge you to find any hotels that have larger mirrored closets or bedrooms as large. You won't be disappointed.    If you want a quiet, relaxing stay, try after labor day, as I do every year. Less crowded and so peaceful. I enjoy having the pool and jacuzzi to myself, some nights with the view of the fire pits and waves across the street at Doheny Beach. Late at
Manager Response: Thanks for your kind words. Seems you made the most out of your week and did some great exploring. We look forward to your next stay ;0)

Summary: Don't dismiss this property.  My three star rating is against my five star standard (Marriot Vacation Club properties) for timeshares. We ended up in an East facing room (ie. non-ocean view).  However, that was fine with us as we were out and about each day.  Leaving little time for gazing out the window.  If you have your mind is set on a ocean view, call 30 days prior to your arrival and they will do there best to accommodate your request.  If you are thinking of doing both San Diego and LA centric activities this a good location.  1 hour to SD Zoo or SeaWorld. 30-40 Minutes to Disneyland.  1+ Hour to USC/Museums.15 minutes to San Juan Capistrano Mission. Times are for non-rush hour. Some rooms have been recently remodeled. Including double paned windows that reduce some of
Manager Response: Thanks for taking the time to post a review! Glad to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. I understand we don't have the amenities that some of the larger (Marriott properties) have to offer; but what we do have is a clean, well-maintained resort with a great personality! Come back and stay with us again, we'll see what we can do to get you an ocean-view room next time. (Of course those back rooms are nice and quiet.)

Summary Heading: Perfect hideaway for those who don't mind all the fufu!!!
Summary: Read past reviews and I must say...We loved this place. Walking distance to beach...across the street. San Clemente pier so close. Has microwave n small fridge. Such a perfect little hidaway. We will be back.
Manager Response: Well put! I am glad you enjoyed your stay. Our resort is not fancy but it's clean, well-maintained, and has a lot of personality. We look forward to your next stay with us. Thanks for taking the time to post a review, we really appreciate the feedback.  Amanda Burgess, General Manager

Summary: We just returned from Capistrano, our second visit to the Surfside Inn.  We totally enjoyed our visit, it's so relaxing, everything you need and then some.  I am handicapped (oxygen 24/7) and when we arrived and parked in the garage we discovered the elevator out of service.  The staff provided me with a space close to the front door limiting the number of steps I would have to climb until the elevator was repaired.  The staff more than goes out of their way.  They go the extra mile, which is so rare anymore.  The kids  didn't want to come out of the ocean in San Clemente (just down the road) and we also spent a day at the SD Zoo.  Each day it was so nice to come back to our room, relax and fix our dinner.  BBQ style.  Great!  I do have one minor complaint, the living room
Manager Response: I am so glad you enjoyed your visit. The elevator was down for a scheduled upgrade during that time and we notified all guests prior to arrival. We did everything we could to not impact our guests, (staff handled luggage, exceptions were made for parking) so I'm glad to hear that our efforts were appreciated and this didn't impact your stay too much.
